components.title: Hero Image Slider Premium
components.description: Advanced hero image slider with animation effects, multiple layouts, and video support. Perfect for creating premium landing pages and product showcases.
components.keyword: hero premium, slider animation, video slider, advanced banner, amazon style, shopify premium

components.title: Premium Product Slider
components.description: Advanced product carousel with multiple display options, hover effects, and smart product recommendations. Essential for amazon-style storefronts.
components.keyword: product carousel, premium products, trending products, best sellers, amazon clone, advanced slider

components.title: Advanced Category Navigation
components.description: Premium category slider with hover overlays and multiple layout options. Great for marketplace platforms and large product catalogs.
components.keyword: category navigation, marketplace, product categories, amazon store, advanced categories

components.title: Advanced Promotional Banners
components.description: Multiple promotional banner layouts with animation effects, countdown timers, and schedule management. Perfect for seasonal sales and marketing campaigns.
components.keyword: promo banner, promotional campaign, seasonal sales, discount banner, marketing banner, amazon deals

components.title: Brand Showcase Grid
components.description: Premium brand showcase with multiple grid layouts and brand filtering. Ideal for electronics, fashion, and multi-vendor marketplace stores.
components.keyword: brands, brand slider, brand grid, shop by brand, amazon brands, marketplace brands

components.title: Smart Product Tabs Slider
components.description: Product slider with advanced tab filtering (Featured, Popular, New, Trending). Perfect for amazon-style product sections with category switching.
components.keyword: product tabs, smart filter, category tabs, featured products, trending products, amazon store

components.title: Premium Newsletter Section
components.description: Advanced newsletter signup with multi-language support, custom animations, and advanced analytics. Perfect for email marketing campaigns.
components.keyword: newsletter premium, email list, subscriber capture, email marketing, lead generation

components.title: Customer Reviews & Testimonials
components.description: Advanced testimonials section with star ratings, verified badges, and video testimonials. Builds trust and credibility for premium stores.
components.keyword: testimonials premium, customer reviews, ratings, verified reviews, social proof, trust builder

components.title: Advanced Product Grid Tabs
components.description: Multi-column product grid with tab-based filtering and infinite scroll. Perfect for showcasing large product collections.
components.keyword: product grid, grid layout, infinite scroll, product tabs, collection display, amazon layout
